name: Altering The Deal
Lore: 'Gamblers are vulnerable to bribery, extortion and other forms of manipulation. Their notorious dealings can be easily taken advantage of.',
Text: 'Deploy on Dining Room.  Dark Deal may deploy here if you control three Bespin sites, and is canceled if opponent controls this site.  While Dark Deal on table and you occupy Bespin, This Deal Is Getting Worse All The Time flips and may not flip back. (Immune to Alter.)',
